resources.string: With a legendary and ever-lengthening list of accomplishments attributable to both his life and music, Bob Marley allows listeners to forget their troubles and dance.
Lady Gaga, born Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta, is an American songwriter, singer, actress, philanthropist, dancer
Miley Ray Cyrus (born Destiny Hope Cyrus; November 23, 1992) is an American singer, songwriter, and actress.
This activity allows the user to play song from favorite list.
Using this activity the user can play,pause, switch to different playlist etc.
User can click on artist and get to activity displaying the songs belonging to that artist, I have not implemented any event for this.
Using this activity the user can play, edit and customise songs in a list
Using this activity the user can control different settings using this activity

In-app Billing API can be used for payment handling. In-app Billing is a Google Play service that lets us sell digital content from inside our applications. Google Play handles all checkout details so our application never has to directly process any financial transactions.
 These steps must be followed to implement In-app Billing in application:
 1.Add the In-app Billing library to your project.
 2.Update AndroidManifest.xml file.
 3.Create a ServiceConnection and bind it to the IInAppBillingService.
 4.Send In-app Billing requests from application to IInAppBillingService.
 5. Handle In-app Billing responses from Google Play.
Using this activity user can use premium service of the app after successful payment
